descriptions.value: For heritage speakers that emphasizes on writing, syntax, and formal modes of the language.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Three class meetings a week
Prerequisites: 197, AP score of 5 on the Spanish Language or Literature Exam, or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam
No P/N
Attendance at first class is required.
